title: Free Online Image & PDF Tools Website - Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Implement modern dark gradient UI with hero section, tool category tabs, smooth transitions, and SEO-optimized footer
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage has a prominent hero section with headline and call-to-action
Tab navigation switches between Image Tools and PDF Tools categories
Dark background with gradient accents applied consistently
Footer displays 'Created by Anurag Singh' and all listed SEO hashtags
No owner name appears in the header or page title
Layout is fully mobile responsive

file_operations.description: Define dark gradient color scheme (navy/charcoal base #0d0d1a to #1a1a2e), cyan-to-violet gradient utilities, smooth transition classes, and glow effect utilities for the entire application theme
Extend Tailwind theme with custom dark gradient colors, cyan-violet gradient stops, card glow shadows, and transition timing for cohesive UI

Create header component with logo (using generated logo-icon.dim_128x128.png from frontend/public/assets/generated/), navigation links to tools categories, and responsive mobile menu. Do not include owner name in header or title

Create footer component displaying 'Created by Anurag Singh', SEO hashtags (#FreeOnlineTools #ImageCompressor #PDFConverter #OnlineTools #AdSenseWebsite #SEOTools #WebTools #DigitalTools), and links to legal pages
Create hero section with generated hero background image (frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x600.png), headline, subheadline, and CTA buttons using cyan-violet gradient styling
Create tab navigation component switching between Image Tools and PDF Tools categories with smooth transitions and active state indicators
Create tool grid layout component with lazy loading, card-based design, hover glow effects, and responsive columns for displaying tool cards
Create individual tool card component with icon, title, description, and link to tool page, applying dark theme with gradient hover effects

Create homepage assembling HeroSection, ToolCategoryTabs, ToolGrid components with proper SEO meta tags, Open Graph tags using generated og-default.dim_1200x630.png from frontend/public/assets/generated/, and JSON-LD WebSite schema
Wire HomePage as the root route, integrate Header and Footer layout components to wrap all routes, and apply global dark gradient theme

requirements.summary: Build 10 fully functional client-side Image Tools with dedicated SEO-optimized pages
acceptanceCriteria: All 10 image tools are accessible via clean URLs (e.g., /tools/image-compressor)
Each tool accepts file input and produces a downloadable output
Image Compressor reduces file size client-side
Image Resizer accepts width/height inputs and outputs resized image
JPG↔PNG and WebP conversions work via canvas API
Image Cropper provides drag-to-crop UI
Image Rotator supports 90/180/270 degree rotation
Background Remover removes a user-specified or auto-detected background color
Image Metadata Viewer displays EXIF/file metadata
Each page has correct meta title, description, OG tags, Twitter card, JSON-LD Tool schema, breadcrumb, FAQ, and related tools section

file_operations.description: Create hook for client-side image compression using canvas API with quality adjustment and size reduction logic
Create hook for image resizing accepting width/height parameters and outputting resized image via canvas manipulation
Create hook for JPG/PNG/WebP format conversions using canvas toDataURL and toBlob methods
Create hook for image cropping with drag selection area and canvas clipping logic
Create hook for image rotation supporting 90/180/270 degree transformations via canvas context rotation
Create hook for basic background removal detecting solid/near-solid background color and replacing with transparency via pixel manipulation
Create hook for extracting EXIF and file metadata from uploaded images using EXIF.js or similar client-side library
Create reusable template component for image tool pages including file upload area, processing controls, preview pane, download button, breadcrumb navigation, FAQ section, and related tools sidebar
Create component for rendering SEO meta tags (title, description, OG tags, Twitter cards, JSON-LD Tool schema, breadcrumb schema) accepting tool-specific content as props
Create Image Compressor tool page using ImageToolTemplate and useImageCompression hook, with SEO meta tags, FAQ about compression, and related tools links
Create Image Resizer tool page using ImageToolTemplate and useImageResize hook, with width/height input fields, SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create JPG to PNG converter page using ImageToolTemplate and useImageConversion hook for JPG→PNG conversion, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create PNG to JPG converter page using ImageToolTemplate and useImageConversion hook for PNG→JPG conversion, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create Image Cropper tool page using ImageToolTemplate and useImageCrop hook with drag-to-crop UI, SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create Image Rotator tool page using ImageToolTemplate and useImageRotation hook with 90/180/270 degree rotation buttons, SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create Image to WebP converter page using ImageToolTemplate and useImageConversion hook for WebP output, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create WebP to JPG converter page using ImageToolTemplate and useImageConversion hook for WebP→JPG conversion, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create Background Remover tool page using ImageToolTemplate and useBackgroundRemoval hook with color picker for target background color, SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create Image Metadata Viewer tool page using ImageToolTemplate and useImageMetadata hook displaying EXIF data in structured format, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools

Register routes for all 10 image tool pages (/tools/image-compressor, /tools/image-resizer, /tools/jpg-to-png, /tools/png-to-jpg, /tools/image-cropper, /tools/image-rotator, /tools/image-to-webp, /tools/webp-to-jpg, /tools/background-remover, /tools/image-metadata-viewer) in the router configuration
Create data file defining all image tools metadata (name, description, icon, route, category, related tools, FAQ content) for use across components and SEO generation

requirements.summary: Build 11 fully functional client-side PDF Tools with dedicated SEO-optimized pages
acceptanceCriteria: All 11 PDF tools are accessible via clean URLs (e.g., /tools/pdf-merge)
PDF Merge accepts multiple PDFs and outputs a single merged PDF
PDF Split accepts page range inputs and outputs separate PDFs
PDF Lock accepts a password and outputs a password-protected PDF
PDF Unlock accepts a password and outputs an unlocked PDF
Add Watermark accepts text input and overlays it on all pages
PDF Page Number Adder appends page numbers to each page
PDF to JPG converts each page to a downloadable JPG
JPG to PDF combines uploaded images into a single PDF
Each page has correct meta title, description, OG tags, Twitter card, JSON-LD Tool schema, breadcrumb, FAQ, and related tools section

file_operations.description: Create hook for merging multiple PDFs using pdf-lib, accepting PDF file array and outputting single merged PDF blob
Create hook for splitting PDF by page ranges using pdf-lib, outputting separate PDF blobs for each range
Create hook for basic PDF compression using pdf-lib optimization methods to reduce file size
Create hook for adding password protection to PDF using pdf-lib encryption (basic simulation acceptable per constraints)
Create hook for removing password protection from PDF using pdf-lib decryption (basic simulation acceptable per constraints)
Create hook for adding text watermark to all PDF pages using pdf-lib text overlay rendering
Create hook for adding page numbers to PDF using pdf-lib text rendering at specified position on each page

Create hook for converting multiple JPG images to single PDF using pdf-lib to embed images as pages
Create hook for extracting text from PDF using pdfjs-dist text extraction API and formatting as plain text output
Create hook for converting HTML/text content to PDF using pdf-lib text rendering with basic formatting
Create reusable template component for PDF tool pages including file upload area, processing controls, preview pane, download button, breadcrumb navigation, FAQ section, and related tools sidebar
Create PDF to Word tool page using PdfToolTemplate and usePdfToWord hook for text extraction, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create Word to PDF tool page using PdfToolTemplate and useWordToPdf hook accepting text/HTML input, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create PDF Merge tool page using PdfToolTemplate and usePdfMerge hook with multiple file upload support, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create PDF Split tool page using PdfToolTemplate and usePdfSplit hook with page range input fields, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create PDF Compressor tool page using PdfToolTemplate and usePdfCompression hook, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create PDF Lock tool page using PdfToolTemplate and usePdfLock hook with password input field, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create PDF Unlock tool page using PdfToolTemplate and usePdfUnlock hook with password input field, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create Add Watermark to PDF tool page using PdfToolTemplate and usePdfWatermark hook with text input and positioning controls, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create PDF Page Number Adder tool page using PdfToolTemplate and usePdfPageNumbers hook with position/format options, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create PDF to JPG tool page using PdfToolTemplate and usePdfToJpg hook outputting JPG for each page, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools
Create JPG to PDF tool page using PdfToolTemplate and useJpgToPdf hook with multiple image upload support, with SEO meta tags, FAQ, and related tools

Register routes for all 11 PDF tool pages (/tools/pdf-to-word, /tools/word-to-pdf, /tools/pdf-merge, /tools/pdf-split, /tools/pdf-compressor, /tools/pdf-lock, /tools/pdf-unlock, /tools/pdf-watermark, /tools/pdf-page-numbers, /tools/pdf-to-jpg, /tools/jpg-to-pdf) in the router configuration
Add all 11 PDF tools metadata (name, description, icon, route, category, related tools, FAQ content) to the tools data export

requirements.summary: Implement AdSense-compatible ad placement layout throughout the site
acceptanceCriteria: Header contains a clearly commented 728×90 ad slot placeholder
Homepage tool grid has ad block placeholders interspersed every 4–6 tools
Tool pages have a 300×250 sidebar ad placeholder
A sticky bottom bar ad placeholder is present on all pages
A delayed popup ad appears after 5 seconds with a close button
All ad slots have <!-- Google AdSense Banner Here --> comments in the HTML
No ad slot overlaps content or violates AdSense policy layout guidelines

file_operations.description: Create reusable ad banner placeholder component accepting size props (e.g., 728x90, 300x250) and rendering empty div with <!-- Google AdSense Banner Here --> HTML comment and appropriate dimensions
Create sticky bottom ad bar component with <!-- Google AdSense Banner Here --> comment, fixed positioning, and close button respecting mobile layout
Create delayed popup ad component with <!-- Google AdSense Banner Here --> comment, appearing after 5 seconds, with dismissible overlay and close button
Integrate 728×90 leaderboard AdBanner component in header with proper spacing and <!-- Google AdSense Banner Here --> comment
Insert AdBanner placeholders between tool cards every 4–6 tools with <!-- Google AdSense Banner Here --> comments and responsive sizing
Add 300×250 sidebar AdBanner component to tool template with <!-- Google AdSense Banner Here --> comment and responsive column layout
Add 300×250 sidebar AdBanner component to PDF tool template with <!-- Google AdSense Banner Here --> comment and responsive column layout
Integrate StickyBottomAd and PopupAd components at root level to appear across all pages, ensuring they do not violate AdSense layout policies

requirements.summary: Build secure admin panel with analytics dashboard and session-based authentication
acceptanceCriteria: /admin redirects unauthenticated users to /admin/login
Login page accepts username and password and creates a session on success
Dashboard displays total visitors, daily visitors, page views, and tool usage counts
A ranked list of most-used tools is shown
A simple chart (bar or line) visualizes daily visitor or tool usage trends
Ad click simulation counter is displayed on the dashboard
Backend stores and retrieves visitor counts, page views, and tool usage data

file_operations.description: Create authentication context managing admin session state using React state (no external auth per constraints), providing login/logout methods and isAuthenticated flag
Create protected route wrapper component checking authentication state and redirecting to /admin/login if unauthenticated
Create admin login page with username and password fields, form submission creating session via AuthContext, and redirect to /admin/dashboard on success

Create admin dashboard page fetching analytics from backend via getDailyAnalytics, displaying total visitors, daily visitors, page views, tool usage counts, most-used tools ranked list, ad click simulation counter, and simple bar/line chart using a charting library (e.g., recharts)
Create hook for fetching and updating analytics data using backend updateAnalytics and getDailyAnalytics methods, managing loading and error states
Create chart component rendering daily visitor or tool usage trends as bar or line chart using recharts library with dark theme styling
Wrap App with AuthContext provider, register /admin/login and /admin/dashboard routes, and wrap /admin/dashboard with ProtectedRoute component to enforce authentication
Create hook for tracking page views and tool usage, calling backend updateAnalytics on route changes and tool interactions to populate analytics data
Integrate usePageTracking hook at root level to automatically track all page views and tool usage for analytics collection

sitemap.xml lists all tool pages, blog pages, and legal pages
